engMode.title: ENG. MODE SETTINGS
engMode.urbanDesc: Urban Mode is the default operating mode that your bike engages every time it's powered on. In this mode, your bike will function with its basic settings i.e maximum speed will be 25 kmph and PAS 0-5 will be active.
engMode.ecoDesc: Eco Mode extends range and preserves battery life. The bike will work in low power mode i.e the power from the motor will be limited to enhance the range, limiting the max speed to 20 kmph
engMode.fitnessDesc: Fitness mode allows you to change throttle cut off and motor resistance settings according to your preference. Turn on the throttle cut off and choose high motor resistance for strict fitness goals.
engMode.labDesc: Customize your bike’s motor power delivery at different speed levels based on your preference. Bike range will be affected based on the settings applied.
engMode.error_no_write: Not Able to Save your Current Eng Mode Settings
engMode.mode_synced: Your custom riding modes are sent to your e-bike.
engMode.mode_saved: Your custom riding modes are Saved.
engMode.info_dialog_title: Engineering mode calibrates power delivery and range of eBike
engMode.urban_description: Default on, basic settings, Max speed 25KmpH, activates PAS 0-5.
engMode.eco_description: Extends range, preserves battery; Max speed 20KmpH, activates PAS 0-3.
engMode.fitness_description: Activate fitness mode, set calorie target, disable throttle, enable PAS 1-3.
engMode.zap_description: Customize bike power for preferred delivery, impacting range.

childMode.instructions: Enabling Child Mode allows users to set a speed limit, ensuring a secure and controlled riding experience for young cyclists.
childMode.set_pin_info: Setup your PIN, to turn on childmode
childMode.access_sett: Setup a personal identification number (PIN) to access Child Mode settings.
childMode.write_unsuccessful: Not Able to update your current child mode settings

goals.text_below_create_goal_fitness_mode: Tap on to create goal with enabled fitness mode
goals.text_below_motor_resistance_for_default_: No resistance, just pure riding pleasure with steady pedal support
goals.text_below_motor_resistance_for_high_tab: Burn more calories with increased motor resistance
